jcr:root.jcr:title: Date/Time field
jcr:root.jcr:description:
The 'datetimefield' is a text input field with a calendar and time popup to select a date. The format of the date/time text value is retrieved from the settings of the site in the context of the edited language variation.

e.g.
<cpp:widget label="Date" property="date" type="datetimefield" i18n="false"required="true"/>
